title: How is the FLIP course in risk management? Does it help with a switch to a risk management profile? Is it recognized by the industry? - Quora
tags: Learning About Risk Management and Insurance

response.answer_text: I have recently done the course on risk management certified by FLIP. Go through the following link for detailed course curriculum: Largest e-learning and certification offering in BFS, in India It is a great combo of Market Risk certified by NSE and Credit and Operational Risk certified by FLIP. This course has provided me a vast knowledge in the field of risk associated with BFS sector and different techniques used to identify, manage and mitigate risk.This course is designed in such a way that it is easy to understand the complex topics and will definetely benefit you in the future in its implementation to real world problems. This course involves practise test and diagnostic test to check your understanding step by step. I recommend this course if you are interested in the field of risk management.

Personally, I felt it was a waste of money and time. The whole course is just like the summary page at the end of a chapter. Plus, there is no audio to the slides which makes it even more difficult to engage in. Reading everything that too just bullet points is no use for a career switch. Think before you spend your money.
